TEXT.TITLE: BARTON VALVE <BART> HOLDERS APPROVE NAME CHANGE
TEXT.BODY: Barton Valve Co Inc said shareholders at the annual meeting approved a name change to Barton Industries Inc and a reduction in board size to three members from five. Reuter
